[Welcome to CAIRO UTM](https://cairo.utm.my/1about-us-2)

---------------------------------------------------------

### CAIRO is a center for Research & Development based in Universiti Teknologi Malaysia, founded in 1997 as one of Centers of Excellence. Specialized in Artificial Intelligence, Robotics, and Control & Automation, CAIRO has strong linkages and networking with both academic institutions and industrial sectors.

[About Us](https://cairo.utm.my/1about-us-2)

[Looking for a Postgraduate Degree in Robotics?](https://cairo.utm.my/1postgraduate-studies-2)

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Postgraduate studies in CAIRO are carried in full research mode, supervised by experienced lecturers.

[Learn More](https://cairo.utm.my/1postgraduate-studies-2)

[Next](https://cairo.utm.my/#)

Vision &¬†Mission

### Vision:

#### To become a Prominent Research Centre of AI and Robotics for Malaysia

### Mission:

#### To uplift AI and Robotics adoption in industry and society through dissemination of knowledge and creation of breakthrough technology

[About Us](https://cairo.utm.my/1about-us-2)

Education

An Industry Leader In Robotics Education
----------------------------------------

CAIRO offers training courses for skilled industrial workers as well as research based postgraduate studies in Robotics & AI.

[Training Courses](https://research.utm.my/cairo/1training-2/)

We also provide practical/industrial training conducted by experienced staff for undergraduates to fullfill requirements of their respective universities.

[Postgraduate Studies](https://cairo.utm.my/1postgraduate-studies-2)

[Practical/Industrial Training](https://cairo.utm.my/1practical-training-2)

R & D

Competence Centre
-----------------

Through our Competence Centre in AI & Robotics, CAIRO has been able to produce numerous products through our R&D in the fields of healthcare, smart manufacturing, field robotics, and agriculture.

[Our Portfolio](https://cairo.utm.my/1competency-centre-2)

Technology Utilization
----------------------

The technology utilized in our R&D at the Competence Centre can be divided into 3 categories; Artificial Intelligence, Robotics and Control.

#### Artificial Intelligence

Machine Vision  
Deep Learning  
Data Analytics  
Optimizations

#### Robotics

Collaborative Robots  
Intelligent Actuators & Sensors  
Soft Robots  
ROV, UAV, UGV, USV  
Industrial loT

#### Control

Real-time Control  
Predictive Control  
Intelligent Control  
Procees Control
